name: Berry Match King: Strawberry Fruit Crush Game
name_original: Berry Match King: Strawberry Fruit Crush Game
description:
Do You Love Berry Match King: , Whether it is strawberry, blueberry, blackberry...? Do you love matching games!? Using your brain to play addicting games? How about adding a twist and matching berries?

Switch and match your way through hundreds of fun levels in this delicious puzzle adventure.

Take on this deliciously sweet Mania alone or play with friends to see who can get the top score!
Candy Berry Match is completely free to play

Match the berries, cross them, line them up, connect them and make a threesome..Tap them, move them and get rid of them all! Come on in and try this multi-level matching game that you will be addicted too!

Berry Match King: Game features:
● Tasty ways to play: Target Score, Timed Levels, Sugar drops, Colors
● Tasty Berries, wrapped and striped Special Berries, Jelly and various other magical boosters to help with challenging levels
● Hundreds of the best levels in the Berry Kingdom with more added every 2 weeks for your entertainment
● It's easy to sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the Internet
● Connect 3 or more berries to get rid of a row!
● If you get more than 3 in a row you get bonus, powerups,.
● Match the object and color by tapping on a block and tapping to where you want to move it.
● The object is to line a berry up with others of its same kind and watch your points add up!
● Tons of levels for endless gameplay!
● Great background and audio.
● Perfect for brain training!
● Great for people who like to think!
